name: Bear Quest (Deku14576)
description:
Bears and an RPG why not... Walk through the calm forest and chill, and ABSOLUTELY DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES Hunt for some food, in order to help your family survive. "This game will make you think twice before beating up a crab" - Some guy who used to beat up crabs. How to play

W A S D to move, E to attack your prey, and Q to inspect. When in combat find the biggest star then click on it to do more damage.

What is this?

In this game  you take on the role of a pre-teen bear who embarks on a hunting trip to feed his family. What will you discover on this Raccoon filled forest?

Official Bear quest Website
